title: Papal Reaction
content: According to what I’ve read about the people that were invited to the White House for the Pope's visit will be surprised at the Pope's reaction to those people. If the Pope follows the word of God because God said “ Ye shall not judge others as ye shall be judged on judgment day”  If the Pope shows no hard feelings about the life that those people are leading,  I think quite a few people will be disappointed. I believe especially president Obama will be disappointed, as it will be like a slap in the face for him if he did that on purpose to get a reaction from the Pope. That’s my little rant of the day.
